cells.data:
### Before Production:

 * Update CodeDeploy Permissions for code deploy user. More restrictive
 * See if Python 3.6 is available on Amazon Yum Repo.

### Before Demo:
* Auto-Scale - Spin up another app box
* RDS Setup for shared DB
* Load Test


### July Deliverables
- [ ] Profile Creation
- [ ] Video Upload
- [ ] Video Transcode / Storage
- [ ] Basic Search
- [ ] Basic Analytics
- [ ] Video Ranked
- [ ] Tag / Category support for videos
- [ ] User "Friending" / Following
- [ ] Featured User increased ranking weight

### Up Next:
- [ ] Finish API Documentation
- [ ] Listen to AWS SNS for - 'RankedEncodingDone' and 'RankedEncodingFailed'
- [ ] Pre-Signed URLs for AWS Posts (Check Boto)
- [ ] Setup gunicorn upstart conf
- [ ] Link filename from /videos/upload to videos object.
- [x] Deployment stalling during afterInstall (gunicorn direct not daemon - upstart)
